<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pos&#91;-1&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;.&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a8156d08864b8327047e16efcbd80f247">isNumberChar</a>(&#42;Pos))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CompareNumbers - compare two numbers, returning true if they are different.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AbsTolerance, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RelTolerance,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one of the positions is at a space and the other isn&#39;t, chomp up &#39;til</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the end of the space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acea2ac67f3ff35107bcf1693416da8e7">isSpace</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&#42;F1P)) &amp;&amp; F1P != F1End)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++F2P;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we stop on numbers, compare their difference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a8156d08864b8327047e16efcbd80f247">isNumberChar</a>(&#42;F1P) || !<a href="#a8156d08864b8327047e16efcbd80f247">isNumberChar</a>(&#42;F2P)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The diff failed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    F1NumEnd = F1P;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    F2NumEnd = F2P;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that some ugliness is built into this to permit support for numbers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that use &quot;D&quot; or &quot;d&quot; as their exponential marker, e.g. &quot;1.234D45&quot;.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occurs in 200.sixtrack in spec2k.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V1 = strtod(F1P, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#42;&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;F1NumEnd));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V2 = strtod(F2P, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#42;&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;F2NumEnd));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;F1NumEnd == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;D&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || &#42;F1NumEnd == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;d&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy string into tmp buffer to replace the &#39;D&#39; with an &#39;e&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;200&gt;</a> StrTmp(F1P, <a href="#a40b372b5f6e9042262fff84eddd9acb1">EndOfNumber</a>(F1NumEnd)+1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Strange exponential notation!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StrTmp&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(F1NumEnd-F1P)&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;e&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      V1 = strtod(&amp;StrTmp&#91;0&#93;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#42;&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;F1NumEnd));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      F1NumEnd = F1P + (F1NumEnd-&amp;StrTmp&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;F2NumEnd == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;D&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || &#42;F2NumEnd == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;d&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy string into tmp buffer to replace the &#39;D&#39; with an &#39;e&#39;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (F1NumEnd == F1P || F2NumEnd == F2P) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrorMsg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FP Comparison failed, not a numeric difference between &#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrorMsg += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#39; and &#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrorMsg += F2P&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrorMsg += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check to see if these are inside the absolute tolerance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AbsTolerance &lt; std::abs(V1-V2)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nope, check the relative tolerance...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Diff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Diff = std::abs(V1/V2 - 1.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Diff = std::abs(V2/V1 - 1.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Diff = 0;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Diff &gt; RelTolerance) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-string-ostream">raw&#95;string&#95;ostream</a>(&#42;ErrorMsg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Compared: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; V1 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; and &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; V2 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;abs. diff = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; std::abs(V1-V2) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; rel.diff = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Diff &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Out of tolerance: rel/abs: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; RelTolerance &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;/&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; AbsTolerance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, advance our read pointers to the end of the numbers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  F1P = F1NumEnd;  F2P = F2NumEnd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DiffFilesWithTolerance - Compare the two files specified, returning 0 if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// files match, 1 if they are different, and 2 if there is a file error.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function differs from DiffFiles in that you can specify an absolute and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// relative FP error that is allowed to exist.  If you specify a string to fill</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in for the error option, it will set the string to an error message if an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// error occurs, allowing the caller to distinguish between a failed diff and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// file system error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aedbcf5909f70207a579202cbbbaa4893"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aedbcf5909f70207a579202cbbbaa4893">llvm::DiffFilesWithTolerance</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NameA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NameB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AbsTol, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RelTol,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 std::string &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now its safe to mmap the files into memory because both files</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Are the buffers identical?  Common case: Handle this efficiently.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (A&#95;size == B&#95;size &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we are done a tolerances are set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AbsTol == 0 &amp;&amp; RelTol == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Files differ without tolerance allowance&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Files different!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompareFailed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan for the end of file or next difference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (F1P &lt; File1End &amp;&amp; F2P &lt; File2End &amp;&amp; &#42;F1P == &#42;F2P) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++F2P;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (F1P &gt;= File1End || F2P &gt;= File2End) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we must have found a difference.  Backup to the start of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current number each stream is at so that we can compare from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beginning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    F1P = <a href="#a044c96e0b7170710fd89551e565937cf">BackupNumber</a>(F1P, File1Start);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we are at the start of the numbers, compare them, exiting if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they don&#39;t match.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad284d03503e7fc4f8dba0aa7b10da106">CompareNumbers</a>(F1P, F2P, File1End, File2End, AbsTol, RelTol, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompareFailed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we reached the end of file.  If both files are at the end, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// succeeded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> F1AtEnd = F1P &gt;= File1End;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we are at the start of the numbers, compare them, exiting if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found the end, we succeeded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (F1P &lt; File1End || F2P &lt; File2End)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"></CodeLine>
